LUAD: Irregular glandular structures; varied sizes and shapes; Tubular, acinar, papillary formations; atypical cell lining; Mucin pools; within/adjacent to tumors; Lepidic growth pattern; overlaying alveolar structures; Variable cell morphology; cuboidal to columnar; hobnail features; Pleomorphic nuclei; prominent nucleoli; Stromal invasion; desmoplastic reaction;
LUSC: Dense cellular clusters; Squamous differentiation; keratinization; intercellular bridges; Keratin pearls formation; Distinct cell borders; Abundant eosinophilic cytoplasm; Large, variably shaped nuclei; prominent nucleoli; Variable cellular differentiation degrees; Necrosis areas; Desmoplastic stroma presence; Inflammatory cell infiltration;
